Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: RKM E-Business Suite
AUTHOR: Oracle
DESCRIPTION Reverse engineering Knowledge Module to retrieve Tables, Views, Flexfields and Interface-tables structures in E-Business Suite (columns, primary keys and foreign keys).
REQUIREMENTS - The Oracle user defined in the ODI data server needs to have privileges to select from FND_% tables, to select from data dictionary, to select from application tables, views and synonyms. Use user APPS for your connection.
OPTIONS (Refer to Option descriptions for more information on each option) - Applications List: List of EBS applications to reverse from - Only Installed Applications: include only installed and shared apps? - Min Rows: only include tables with at least <Min row> records - Description Mask: filter for object description - Flexfields: include Flexfields? See option for more details. - Interface Tables: include Interface Tables? See option for more details.
LIMITATIONS - The tab Selective reverse cannot be used with this knowledge module. - Option "Min Rows" requires Oracle statistics to be computed on all tables.
List of the applications' short names as described in the APPLSYS.FND_APPLICATION table. These names must be between quotes and separated by commas. Eg: 'PO','GL'
If this option is selected, only installed and shared applications are reversed. Otherwise, all applications are reversed.
Minimum rows to reverse a table
Only tables with this minimum number of rows will be reversed. * A value of 0 means all the tables * Statistics have to be computed to use this option
Only objects whose descriptions match the mask pattern will be reversed.
If this option is selected, applications' flexfields are reversed Please note that FlexFields are only reversed, if View checkbox on the model's reverse tab is checked.
If this option is selected, applications' interface tables are reversed Please note that Interface Tables are only reversed, if the Tables checkbox on the model's reverse tab is checked.

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, COL_HEADING, DT_DRIVER, COL_DESC_C, POS, LONGC, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :COL_HEADING, :DT_DRIVER, :COL_DESC, :POS, :LONGC, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, '0', '1' )

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, COL_HEADING, DT_DRIVER, COL_DESC_C, POS, LONGC, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :COL_HEADING, :DT_DRIVER, :COL_DESC, :POS, :LONGC, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, '0', '1' )

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, COL_HEADING, DT_DRIVER, COL_DESC_C, POS, LONGC, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :COL_HEADING, :DT_DRIVER, :COL_DESC, :POS, :LONGC, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, '0', '1' )

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, COL_HEADING, DT_DRIVER, COL_DESC_C, POS, LONGC, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :COL_HEADING, :DT_DRIVER, :COL_DESC, :POS, :LONGC, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, '0', '1' )

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN ( MOD_GUID, FK_NAME, TABLE_NAME, FK_TYPE, PK_SCHEMA, PK_TABLE_NAME, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW, IND_ACTIVE ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :FK_NAME, :TABLE_NAME, 'D' , :SCHEMA_NAME, :PK_TABLE_NAME, '1', '1', '0' )

select fkoau.oracle_username FK_USER_NAME, fkoat.table_name TABLE_NAME, TRIM(fk.foreign_key_name)||'_'||TRIM(fkoat.table_name) FK_NAME, pkoau.oracle_username PK_USER_NAME, pkoat.table_name PK_TABLE_NAME, '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' SCHEMA_NAME from applsys.fnd_foreign_keys fk, applsys.fnd_oracle_userid fkoau, applsys.fnd_product_installations fkoap, applsys.fnd_application fkoaa, applsys.fnd_tables fkoat, applsys.fnd_tables pkoat, applsys.fnd_oracle_userid pkoau, applsys.fnd_product_installations pkoap, applsys.fnd_application pkoaa where fkoaa.application_id = fkoap.application_id and fk.application_id = fkoat.application_id and fk.table_id = fkoat.table_id and fkoap.oracle_id = fkoau.oracle_id and fkoat.application_id = fkoaa.application_id and fk.primary_key_application_id = pkoat.application_id and fk.primary_key_table_id = pkoat.table_id and pkoaa.application_id = pkoat.application_id and pkoap.application_id = pkoaa.application_id and pkoap.oracle_id = pkoau.oracle_id and fkoat.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>%' and pkoap.status <> decode('<%=odiRef.getOption("Only Installed Applications")%>','1','N','z') and fkoaa.application_short_name in(<%=odiRef.getOption("Applications List")%>) and fkoap.status <> decode('<%=odiRef.getOption("Only Installed Applications")%>','1','N','z') and ''||fkoat.description like '<%=odiRef.getOption("Description Mask")%>%'

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN_COL ( MOD_GUID, FK_NAME, FK_COL_NAME, FK_TABLE_NAME, PK_COL_NAME, PK_TABLE_NAME, POS ) Values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :FK_NAME, :FK_COL_NAME, :FK_TABLE_NAME, :PK_COL_NAME, :PK_TABLE_NAME, :POS )

select fkoat.table_name FK_TABLE_NAME, pkoat.table_name PK_TABLE_NAME, TRIM(fk.foreign_key_name)||'_'||TRIM(fkoat.table_name) FK_NAME, substr(fkoac.column_name,1,35) FK_COL_NAME, pkoac.column_name PK_COL_NAME, fkc.foreign_key_sequence POS from applsys.fnd_foreign_keys fk, applsys.fnd_oracle_userid fkoau, applsys.fnd_product_installations fkoap, applsys.fnd_application fkoaa, applsys.fnd_tables fkoat, applsys.fnd_foreign_key_columns fkc, applsys.fnd_columns fkoac, applsys.fnd_tables pkoat, applsys.fnd_oracle_userid pkoau, applsys.fnd_product_installations pkoap, applsys.fnd_application pkoaa, applsys.fnd_primary_key_columns pkc, applsys.fnd_columns pkoac where fkoaa.application_id = fkoap.application_id and fk.application_id = fkoat.application_id and fk.table_id = fkoat.table_id and fkoap.oracle_id = fkoau.oracle_id and fkoap.status <> decode('<%=odiRef.getOption("Only Installed Applications")%>','1','N','z') and fkoat.application_id = fkoaa.application_id and fkoaa.application_short_name in (<%=odiRef.getOption("Applications List")%>) and fkoat.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>%' and fk.application_id = fkc.application_id and fk.table_id = fkc.table_id and fk.foreign_key_id = fkc.foreign_key_id and fkoac.application_id = fkc.application_id and fkoac.table_id = fkc.table_id and fkoac.column_id = fkc.column_id and fk.primary_key_application_id = pkoat.application_id and fk.primary_key_table_id = pkoat.table_id and pkoaa.application_id = pkoat.application_id and pkoap.application_id = pkoaa.application_id and pkoap.oracle_id = pkoau.oracle_id and pkoap.status <> decode('<%=odiRef.getOption("Only Installed Applications")%>','1','N','z') and fk.primary_key_application_id = pkc.application_id and fk.primary_key_table_id = pkc.table_id and pkc.primary_key_sequence = fkc.foreign_key_sequence and pkoac.application_id = pkc.application_id and pkoac.table_id = pkc.table_id and pkoac.column_id = pkc.column_id and fk.primary_key_id = pkc.primary_key_id and ''||fkoat.description like '<%=odiRef.getOption("Description Mask")%>%'

insert into SNP_REV_KEY ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT ) Values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :CONS_TYPE, '1', '1', '1' )

select /*+ RULE */ oat.table_name TABLE_NAME, decode(instr(pk.primary_key_name,'PK'),0,'AK','PK') CONS_TYPE, pk.primary_key_name KEY_NAME from applsys.fnd_oracle_userid oau, applsys.fnd_product_installations oap, applsys.fnd_application oaa, applsys.fnd_tables oat, applsys.fnd_primary_keys pk where oaa.application_id = oap.application_id and oap.oracle_id = oau.oracle_id and oap.status <> decode('<%=odiRef.getOption("Only Installed Applications")%>','1','N','z') and oat.application_id = oaa.application_id and oaa.application_short_name in (<%=odiRef.getOption("Applications List")%>) and ''||oat.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>%' and oat.application_id = pk.application_id and oat.table_id = pk.table_id and ''||oat.description like '<%=odiRef.getOption("Description Mask")%>%'
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS ) Values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS )

select /*+ RULE */ oat.table_name TABLE_NAME, pk.primary_key_name KEY_NAME, pkoac.column_name COL_NAME, pkc.primary_key_sequence POS from applsys.fnd_oracle_userid oau, applsys.fnd_product_installations oap, applsys.fnd_application oaa, applsys.fnd_tables oat, applsys.fnd_primary_keys pk, applsys.fnd_primary_key_columns pkc, applsys.fnd_columns pkoac where oaa.application_id = oap.application_id and oap.oracle_id = oau.oracle_id and oap.status <> decode('<%=odiRef.getOption("Only Installed Applications")%>','1','N','z') and oat.application_id = oaa.application_id and oaa.application_short_name in (<%=odiRef.getOption("Applications List")%>) and ''||oat.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>%' and oat.application_id = pk.application_id and oat.table_id = pk.table_id and pk.application_id = pkc.application_id and pk.table_id = pkc.table_id and pk.primary_key_id = pkc.primary_key_id and pkoac.application_id = pkc.application_id and pkoac.table_id = pkc.table_id and pkoac.column_id = pkc.column_id and ''||oat.description like '<%=odiRef.getOption("Description Mask")%>%'
insert into SNP_REV_SUB_MODEL ( MOD_GUID, SMOD_CODE, SMOD_NAME, REV_APPY_PATTERN, IND_INTEGRATION ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :SMOD_CODE, :SMOD_NAME, '0', '0' )

select substr(a.application_short_name,1,35) SMOD_CODE, substr( 'Application '|| a.application_short_name,1,100) SMOD_NAME from applsys.fnd_application a, applsys.fnd_oracle_userid u, applsys.fnd_product_installations p where a.application_id = p.application_id and p.oracle_id = u.oracle_id and a.application_short_name in (<%=odiRef.getOption("Applications List")%>) and p.status <> decode('<%=odiRef.getOption("Only Installed Applications")%>','1','N','z')

insert into SNP_REV_SUB_MODEL ( MOD_GUID, SMOD_CODE, SMOD_NAME, REV_APPY_PATTERN, IND_INTEGRATION, SMOD_PARENT_CODE ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :SMOD_CODE, :SMOD_NAME, '0', '0', :SMOD_PARENT_CODE )

select substr(a.application_short_name,1,35) SMOD_PARENT_CODE, substr('ITBL_' || a.application_short_name,1,35) SMOD_CODE, substr('Interface Tables on ' || a.application_short_name,1,100) SMOD_NAME from applsys.fnd_application a, applsys.fnd_oracle_userid u, applsys.fnd_product_installations p where a.application_id = p.application_id and p.oracle_id = u.oracle_id and a.application_short_name in (<%=odiRef.getOption("Applications List")%>) and p.status <> decode('<%=odiRef.getOption("Only Installed Applications")%>','1','N','z')

insert into SNP_REV_SUB_MODEL ( MOD_GUID, SMOD_CODE, SMOD_NAME, REV_APPY_PATTERN, IND_INTEGRATION, SMOD_PARENT_CODE ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :SMOD_CODE, :SMOD_NAME, '0', '0', :SMOD_PARENT_CODE )

select substr(a.application_short_name,1,35) SMOD_PARENT_CODE, substr('VIEW_' || a.application_short_name,1,35) SMOD_CODE, substr('Views on ' || a.application_short_name,1,100) SMOD_NAME from applsys.fnd_application a, applsys.fnd_oracle_userid u, applsys.fnd_product_installations p where a.application_id = p.application_id and p.oracle_id = u.oracle_id and a.application_short_name in (<%=odiRef.getOption("Applications List")%>) and p.status <> decode('<%=odiRef.getOption("Only Installed Applications")%>','1','N','z') and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0

insert into SNP_REV_SUB_MODEL ( MOD_GUID, SMOD_CODE, SMOD_NAME, REV_APPY_PATTERN, IND_INTEGRATION, SMOD_PARENT_CODE ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :SMOD_CODE, :SMOD_NAME, '0', '0', :SMOD_PARENT_CODE )

select substr(a.application_short_name,1,35) SMOD_PARENT_CODE, substr('FLEX_' || a.application_short_name,1,35) SMOD_CODE, substr('Flexfields on ' || a.application_short_name,1,100) SMOD_NAME from applsys.fnd_application a, applsys.fnd_oracle_userid u, applsys.fnd_product_installations p where a.application_id = p.application_id and p.oracle_id = u.oracle_id and a.application_short_name in (<%=odiRef.getOption("Applications List")%>) and p.status <> decode('<%=odiRef.getOption("Only Installed Applications")%>','1','N','z')

insert into SNP_REV_TABLE ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_DESC_C, IND_SHOW, R_COUNT, SMOD_CODE ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, 'T', :TABLE_DESC, '1', :R_COUNT, :SMOD_CODE )

insert into SNP_REV_TABLE ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_DESC_C, IND_SHOW, R_COUNT, SMOD_CODE ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, 'T', :TABLE_DESC, '1', :R_COUNT, :SMOD_CODE )

insert into SNP_REV_TABLE ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_DESC_C, IND_SHOW, SMOD_CODE ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, 'V', :TABLE_DESC, '1', :SMOD_CODE )

insert into SNP_REV_TABLE ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_DESC_C, IND_SHOW, SMOD_CODE ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, 'V', :TABLE_DESC, '1', :SMOD_CODE )

insert into SNP_REV_SUB_MODEL ( MOD_GUID, SMOD_CODE, SMOD_NAME, REV_APPY_PATTERN, IND_INTEGRATION, SMOD_PARENT_CODE ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :SMOD_CODE, :SMOD_NAME, '0', '0', :SMOD_PARENT_CODE )

select substr(a.application_short_name,1,35) SMOD_PARENT_CODE, substr('TABL_' || a.application_short_name,1,35) SMOD_CODE, substr('Tables on ' || a.application_short_name,1,100) SMOD_NAME from applsys.fnd_application a, applsys.fnd_oracle_userid u, applsys.fnd_product_installations p where a.application_id = p.application_id and p.oracle_id = u.oracle_id and a.application_short_name in (<%=odiRef.getOption("Applications List")%>) and p.status <> decode('<%=odiRef.getOption("Only Installed Applications")%>','1','N','z') and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0
